title: Genome annotation with Maker (short)
questions: How to annotate an eukaryotic genome?
How to evaluate and visualize annotated genomic features?
key_points: Maker allows to annotate a eukaryotic genome.
BUSCO and JBrowse allow to inspect the quality of an annotation.

workflows.name: Genome annotation with Maker (short)
workflows.title: Genome annotation with Maker (short)

history.message: update maker tutorial and add a short version
